name: Progenitor Dragon of Total Purity, Agnos
effect:
[Stride]-Stride Step-[COST][Discard a card with the same card name as a card on your (VC)] [Stride] this card on your (VC) from face down.
[CONT]G Zone:This card cannot be turned face up by abilities. If this card is face up, you can [Stride] without paying the [Stride] cost.
[AUTO](VC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], call as many cards from your hand to all (RC) as possible, and draw three cards.

name: Progenitor Dragon of Lightning Flame, Gilgal
effect:
[Stride]-Stride Step-[COST][Discard a card with the same card name as a card on your (VC)] [Stride] this card on your (VC) from face down.

effect:

[AUTO](VC):When your rear-guard is placed from deck, that unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn for each face up card in your G zone.

[CONT]G zone:If this card is face up, when you would count the number of cards in your hand, include the face up cards in your G zone.

until end of turn, one of your rear-guards gets [Power] +10000/[Critical] +1. If your soul has four or less cards, draw two cards, and [Soul-Charge 5].
